entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a wise and experienced wizard who tries to explain the situation of Kreacher to Harry. He says that Kreacher's existence has been miserable and that he was forced to do Sirius's bidding.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is mentioned as a foul and lying creature who was enslaved by the Black family. He was forced to do Sirius's bidding but felt no loyalty to him.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as Harry's friend who was the last of the family that Kreacher was enslaved by. Dumbledore criticizes Sirius for not making Kreacher's lot easier.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is mentioned as a friend of Harry's whose existence has been miserable like Kreacher's.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as a teacher who sneered at Harry when he told him that Voldemort had Sirius.
